Rule.Name: CurlyBracketsMustNotBeOmitted
Rule.Context: The body of the {0} must be wrapped in opening and closing curly brackets.
Rule.Description: Validates that opening and closing curly brackets are always included, even if the statement type allows them to be omitted.
